targets.expr: (max by (name, container_label_capp_environment) (container_status_enum{container_label_capp_app="APP", container_label_capp_environment="dev", container_status_enum="stopping"}) + max by (name, container_label_capp_environment) (container_status_enum{container_label_capp_app="APP", container_status_enum="exited"}) * 2 + max by (name, container_label_capp_environment) (container_status_enum{container_label_capp_app="APP", container_label_capp_environment="dev", container_status_enum="exited-crashed"}) * 3 + max by (name, container_label_capp_environment) (container_status_enum{container_label_capp_app="APP", container_label_capp_environment="dev", container_status_enum="restarting"}) * 4 + max by (name, container_label_capp_environment) (container_status_enum{container_label_capp_app="APP", container_label_capp_environment="dev", container_status_enum="created"}) * 5 + max by (name, container_label_capp_environment) (container_status_enum{container_label_capp_app="APP", container_label_capp_environment="dev", container_status_enum="paused"}) * 6 + max by (name, container_label_capp_environment) (container_status_enum{container_label_capp_app="APP", container_label_capp_environment="dev", container_status_enum="running"}) * 7) != 0

title: APP Container states (1: stopping, 2: exited, 3: crashed, 4: restarting, 5: created, 6: paused, 7: running) - Dev environment
